body.name: Heated Car Blanket - 12-Volt Electric Blanket for Car, Truck, SUV, or RV - Portable Heated Throw - Camping Essentials by Stalwart (Black Plaid)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.

FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: CAR-ADAPTABLE PORTABLE HEATED BLANKET - This fleece 12-volt electric blanket plugs into the cigarette lighter of cars, trucks, SUVs, or RVs to provide portable warmth. The throw heats up quickly and will stay nice and warm until you unplug it.

LONG CORD - Equipped with a 96-inch-long cord, this heated electric blanket for cars can reach all seats in most vehicles, ensuring that even back seat passengers stay warm. It's an ideal way to maintain comfort during long road trips on cold days.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND WARM - This lightweight heated car blanket contains thin wires that give off warm and comfortable heat. The throw folds easily so it can be stored in a car trunk, on a back seat, or packed in a bag without taking up too much space.

GREAT GIFT - This heated blanket for cars is the perfect winter travel and camping accessory for adventurous people. It's great for vehicle emergency kits, RVs, and tailgating, providing a thoughtful gift for your friends and family this cold season.
PRODUCT DETAILS - Materials: Polyester. Dimensions: (L) 59" x (W) 43"; Cord Length: 96". Care: Spot Clean Only. Do Not Machine Wash. Includes Storage Case with Handles. Color: Black and White Plaid.
body.description: Stay warm during long road trips or while camping in your vehicle with the Heated Car Blanket by Stalwart. This 12-volt electric blanket features a 96-inch-long cord that plugs right into your cigarette lighter, making it easy to keep everyone warm and comfortable, whether sitting in the front or back of the vehicle. With its lightweight design for easy movement and classic plaid pattern, this heated car blanket is the perfect cold weather accessory for cars, trucks, SUVs, and RVs, and is ideal for road trips, tailgating, or camping. IMPORTANT: Stalwart is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Stalwart and ONLY Car Blankets and Throws by Stalwart are GUARANTEED to be genuine. Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 12V Heated Blanket Stay cozy while traveling this winter with the Car Heated Blanket by Stalwart, whether you’re road tripping to see family for the holidays or simply commuting to work. This soft fleece travel blanket is powered by the 12V auxiliary power outlet in your car, truck, SUV, or RV, with a cord long enough that it can be used in the front seat or by passengers in the backseat.

12V Heated Blanket Stay cozy while traveling this winter with the Car Heated Blanket by Stalwart, whether you’re road tripping to see family for the holidays or simply commuting to work. This soft fleece travel blanket is powered by the 12V auxiliary power outlet in your car, truck, SUV, or RV, with a cord long enough that it can be used in the front seat or by passengers in the backseat.

Cozy Comfort Keep toasty warm when you’re on-the-go with this 12V electric car blanket, which is made of soft polyester fleece in a stylish black and white buffalo check plaid pattern. Use it as a lap blanket, as a dog blanket for car rides, or fold it to use as a snuggly pillow. This soft blanket is a must for any emergency car kit, and a great way to make any trip a more pleasant one.

Smart Features This warm but lightweight travel blanket comes equipped with a 96-inch cord that is long enough to plug into your vehicle’s 12-volt AUX outlet from either the front or back, so even backseat passengers can stay toasty warm. Use this portable heated blanket to stay cozy on long drives during cold weather travel, tailgating, or on camping trips.

Stylish Design With an on-trend black and white buffalo check pattern, this portable heating blanket will be a stylish addition to your winter car accessories or tailgate essentials. This heated car blanket also makes a great gift to keep your loved ones cozy when they’re on-the-go, whether they have a long commute, are a new driver you want to feel secure driving in any weather, or college students in need of some extra warmth when they make the drive back home for the holidays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm. Works well. This is perfect for the truck.
reviews.reviewText: I have no complaints. It's comfortable feeling material. Regular 12 volt auxiliary power outlet cord. Seems decently thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This electric blanket for the car was my fix for not having heated seats and it works perfectly. I tuck the blanket in around my drivers seat and for the most part it says in place. There is no temperature control so when it gets too warm I just have to unplug it and since my plug is next to me in the console, it is not a terrible inconvenience. I am happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This isn't something to write home about, it is nice and works.Cons:It is thin (but is warm as a blanket)Can feel the wires in the blanket (doesn't really bother me)Doesn't heat up super fast.Doesn't get crazy warm.You NEED to unplug it when you leave the car 🙄 I have a major squirrel brain at times.Pros:Soft and can be used as a regular blanketEasy to spot cleanSize is very decent, it is not very small. Think throw blanket size.Gets the job done.If you want something that is going to work fast and get HEAT then you will probably have to spend the money to get something nicer. But for how much it costed and just needing a little extra wormth in the cold weather this is not a bad product. It could also be my car outlet/lighter that doesn't have the greatest strength and I have yet to try it in another vehicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Wonderful Purchase!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for the trip home from a hospital stay. I had major surgery and it was during the cold, snowy month ! This was wonderful as I was able to truly get comfortable and warm for the 3 hours ride home. My husband does not enjoy heat as I do and this was just the thing! Kept me tasty warm and cozy the entire trip - helping me to relax and sleep!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm using my new blanket for camping and it is just perfect it's 12 volts plug in however it does not use that much power it's important to understand that this blanket is not like an electric blanket it does not get very warm or hot it is just a little bit warm just to be sure that you're not freezing on those cold nights. If you are looking for a deluxe electric blanket with heat control this one is probably not for you if you were looking for an inexpensive blanket you can keep in your vehicle and use when your legs are cold this is a good choice. Please also note that you need to plug it in to turn it on and pull the plug to turn it off it plugs into a standard cigarette or cigar outlet. I can say after using it two nights that it does not use that much power and it did not drain my battery keeping it on all night long however in my camper I do have multiple batteries. For the price it is an excellent choice. MarkMannM2

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This blanket is very soft and does get nice and toasty, eventually. I got this for my daughter who still rides in a booster in the back seat of my truck where the heat takes a while to get. On cold maine winter mornings it can be torture waiting for the truck to warm up so I got this a a possible solution. The blanket is extremely soft has a little bit of weight to it but, unfortunately, it takes forever to heat up as well so, by the time we get her to school it is working at full capacity unfortunately, too little too late also, there’s no power switch, so remembering to plug and unplug it is a bit of a nuisance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t think this thing was gonna warm up enough or even warm up enough to keep me warm, since I have sciatica, it actually does help and it does heat up good. It heats up faster if you sit on it & after a couple minutes. Works even better if you wrap yourself in it. 👍🏼💚

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 2 1/2 yo grandson to use while riding in a car seat when it is cold. He loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a present and was only used for the first time after the return period had expired. Doesn’t get remotely warm. Waste of money.Would give zero rating if possible.

I bought this blanket for school pick up. No idling is allowed outside of the school and it gets really cold sitting in a car that has been turned off for more than 45 minutes. This blanket warms up within a couple of minutes and really keeps you warm. You don't have to have the car on ... It can heat up from your car's battery. I've sat in my car for sometimes upwards of 45 minutes using the blanket and charging it from my car's battery. if you're going to do this it's important that your car battery has an opportunity to recharge. For me personally I have a drive upwards of an hour afterwards so my battery gets to recharge on the drive home. This product is brilliant! I love it!! I recommend it to everyone the needs this type of solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Dangerous not safe sorry plugged it in 15min later smoking not good
We keep this in the car for the winter months & we have never used it as it’s more for break downs and so far we haven’t required it
It’s a nice blanket and heated up well but cord is shorter then says in description.
